titleStmt.title: A relation of the glorious triumphs and order of the ceremonies, obserued in the marriage of the high and mighty Charles, King of Great Brittaine, and the Ladie Henretta [sic] Maria, sister to the most Christian King of France Together vvith the ceremonie obserued in their troth-plighting, performed in the castle of the Louure, in his Maiesties chamber there. As also the Kings declaration containing a prohibition vnto all his subiects to use any traffique or commerce with the kingdome of Spaine. Published in the Parliament of Paris, the 12. of May, 1625. Whereunto the originall French copie is added.
Ceremonies et solennitez observees en l'eglise de Nostre Dame de Paris, au mariage du roy de la Grand' Bretagne, & de Madame soeur du roy. English and French.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1610-1643 : Louis XIII). Proclamations, 1625-05-12.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham and others] for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be sold at the signe of the Pyde-Bull, neere S. Austens Gate,

notesStmt.note: A translation of "Ceremonies et solennitez observees en l'eglise de Nostre Dame de Paris, au mariage du roy de la Grand' Bretagne, & de Madame soeur du roy", with the French text following.
The "Kings declaration" is that of Louis XIII.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-C‚Å¥.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
